preproc

This module deals with the pre-processing of HFI data from Planck maps. These functions transform all-sky maps into HEALPix tiles, according to which the data is split into training, validation, and test. After that, the samples themselves are generated.

Planck data can be accessed here.

preproc.Planck.extract_data_key(path: str, key: str, idx: int = 1) → numpy.ndarray

From fits file extract data by key.

Parameters

  • path (str) – Input path.

  • key (str) – Keyword to exract.

Return type

np.ndarray

preproc.Planck.match_channels(indir: str, channels: List[int]) → Dict[int, str]

For each channel find corresponding file

Parameters

  • indir (str) – Input dir.

  • channels (List[int]) – channels.

Return type

Dict[int, str]
